LanguageData.glwExtendLaunchWindowExpiryCooldown: Extend the Post-Launch Window Expiry Cooldown for Emergency Startups
LanguageData.glwEmergencyStartupRitualFactor: Emergency Startup quality offset (0-1. Is subtracted from the total ritual quality)
LanguageData.glwwindowcooldown: Length of cooldown period after GravLaunch window expiry
LanguageData.glwelEmergencyCooldown: Length of cooldown period between Emergency Startups
LanguageData.glwelExtraExpiryCooldown: Length of extra cooldown after GravLaunch window expiry for Emergency Startups
LanguageData.glwsendLetters: Send letters when startup sequence finishes or when launch window closes
LanguageData.glwshowAlerts: Show alerts for startup sequence and launch window
